unnormalised: The monsoon had just begun to paint Mumbai in its characteristic grey hues, and I was late. Not just a little late, but 'Indian Standard Time' late, which, as any local will tell you, is a completely different dimension of tardiness. I was supposed to be at a meeting at the new Godrej BKC building, a sleek glass tower that pierced the sky, a monument to modern Mumbai rising from the organized chaos of Bandra Kurla Complex. My auto-rickshaw driver, a grizzled fellow named Sharmaji, navigated the flooded streets with the expertise of a seasoned sailor in a storm.
normalised: The monsoon had just begun to paint Mumbai in its characteristic grey hues, and I was late. Not just a little late, but 'Indian Standard Time' late, which, as any local will tell you, is a completely different dimension of tardiness. I was supposed to be at a meeting at the new Godrej B-K-C building, a sleek glass tower that pierced the sky, a monument to modern Mumbai rising from the organized chaos of Bandra Kurla Complex. My auto-rickshaw driver, a grizzled fellow named Sharmaji, navigated the flooded streets with the expertise of a seasoned sailor in a storm.

unnormalised: "Madam, BKC mein traffic toh aisa hi hota hai," he grumbled, referring to the notorious traffic of BKC. "Especially near the American Consulate. Vahan par security bhi tight hoti hai." He was right. The closer we got to the consulate, located at C-49, G Block, Bandra Kurla Complex, Bandra East, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400051, the more congested it became. Checkpoints, barricades, and a phalanx of security personnel made it clear that this was no ordinary business district.
normalised: "Madam, B-K-C mein traffic toh aisa hi hota hai," he grumbled, referring to the notorious traffic of B-K-C. "Especially near the American Consulate. Vahan par security bhi tight hoti hai." He was right. The closer we got to the consulate, located at C-forty nine, G Block, Bandra Kurla Complex, Bandra East, Mumbai, Maharashtra four hundred thousand fifty one, the more congested it became. Checkpoints, barricades, and a phalanx of security personnel made it clear that this was no ordinary business district.

unnormalised: My meeting was at the headquarters of 'Innovate Solutions Pvt. Ltd.', a tech startup that had been making waves in the Indian market. Their office address was listed as Unit No. 201, Second Floor, The Capital, Plot No. C-70, G Block, Bandra Kurla Complex, Mumbai 400051. I was supposed to discuss a potential collaboration with their marketing team.
normalised: My meeting was at the headquarters of 'Innovate Solutions Private Limited', a tech startup that had been making waves in the Indian market. Their office address was listed as Unit Number two hundred and one, Second Floor, The Capital, Plot Number C-seventy, G Block, Bandra Kurla Complex, Mumbai four hundred thousand fifty one. I was supposed to discuss a potential collaboration with their marketing team.

unnormalised: Sharmaji finally dropped me off near The Capital. It was a different beast altogether compared to the surrounding buildings, more mature and established. I paid him Rs. 80, a standard fare despite the monsoon surcharge and the considerable delay. He gave me a weary smile and muttered, "Bhagwan aapka bhala kare, madam!" (May God bless you, madam!).
normalised: Sharmaji finally dropped me off near The Capital. It was a different beast altogether compared to the surrounding buildings, more mature and established. I paid him rupees eighty, a standard fare despite the monsoon surcharge and the considerable delay. He gave me a weary smile and muttered, "Bhagwan aapka bhala kare, madam!" (May God bless you, madam!).

unnormalised: Inside, the lobby of The Capital bustled with activity. Businessmen in crisp suits, young professionals glued to their phones, and delivery personnel carrying everything from tiffin boxes to important documents created a microcosm of Mumbai's dynamic energy. A large directory listed all the companies housed within the building. Innovate Solutions was easily located on the second floor.
normalised: Inside, the lobby of The Capital bustled with activity. Businessmen in crisp suits, young professionals glued to their phones, and delivery personnel carrying everything from tiffin boxes to important documents created a microcosm of Mumbai's dynamic energy. A large directory listed all the companies housed within the building. Innovate Solutions was easily located on the second floor.

unnormalised: I finally made it to Unit No. 201, Innovate Solutions’ office. The place was a hive of activity – coders huddled over laptops, designers sketching on whiteboards, and marketers animatedly discussing campaigns. Their address, displayed prominently on the reception desk, felt more real, more concrete than the sterile information I’d seen online.
normalised: I finally made it to Unit Number two hundred and one, Innovate Solutions’ office. The place was a hive of activity – coders huddled over laptops, designers sketching on whiteboards, and marketers animatedly discussing campaigns. Their address, displayed prominently on the reception desk, felt more real, more concrete than the sterile information I’d seen online.

unnormalised: After a productive meeting, where we ironed out the details of our collaboration, I stepped out, the Mumbai dusk settling in. The Bandra Kurla Complex, with its labyrinthine streets and impressive edifices, felt both exhilarating and overwhelming. The address, more than just a string of numbers and letters, represented a location, a purpose, and a story unfolding in the heart of India's financial capital. Even Sharmaji’s mumbled blessings from earlier seemed to echo in the organized chaos of BKC. The sprawling area, encompassing offices like Plot C-22, G Block, Bandra Kurla Complex, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400098 felt alive and buzzing with energy.
normalised: After a productive meeting, where we ironed out the details of our collaboration, I stepped out, the Mumbai dusk settling in. The Bandra Kurla Complex, with its labyrinthine streets and impressive edifices, felt both exhilarating and overwhelming. The address, more than just a string of numbers and letters, represented a location, a purpose, and a story unfolding in the heart of India's financial capital. Even Sharmaji’s mumbled blessings from earlier seemed to echo in the organized chaos of B-K-C. The sprawling area, encompassing offices like Plot C-twenty two, G Block, Bandra Kurla Complex, Mumbai, Maharashtra four hundred thousand ninety eight felt alive and buzzing with energy.
